conclusion: Plan to analyze the image to understand the flow path of the liquid through the baffles and determine which container the liquid will flow into.
The image shows three spouts labeled A, B, and C releasing liquid, which flows through baffles towards two containers labeled D and E.
Observe the flow direction from spout A; the liquid flows through the first baffle and turns towards container E.
Examine the flow from spout B; the liquid moves through the second baffle and directs towards container E.
Analyze the flow from spout C; the liquid passes through the third baffle and directs towards container E.
Based on the flow directions from all spouts, the liquid consistently flows towards container E.
The liquid will flow into container E after passing through the baffles.
